title: High Noxian Cass
body:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lyT94Np.jpg[/img]

Day 3....so I was checking out universe and saw some noxian concepts of the people and I was like yisus they look like a sith....and a society like noxus would totally embrace Cass because of her raw power...plus Im a huge fan of champion in differents aspects of his region....tried a painterly sketch.

replies.body: If only Riot had your level of creativity. Amazing work as always!
